[docs]def MSG(args, doprint: bool=True, msg: str="", style=(Style.DIM, Fore.BLACK, Back.LIGHTBLUE_EX)):
    if doprint:
        print(style[0] + style[1] + style[2]  + msg.format(*args))
        print(Style.NORMAL + Fore.WHITE + Back.BLACK)
